body: I made a small montage but I have 1 problem. It takes me 900 minutes to upload a minute video... WTF? I uploaded some random vids a while back and they were longer but took less time to upload...
body_tagged: I made a small montage but I have 1 problem. It takes me 900 minutes to upload a minute video... WTF? I uploaded some random vids a while back and they were longer but took less time to upload...
title: Halp!

replies.body: Might be because your internet is slow.
replies.body_tagged: Might be because your internet is slow.

replies.body:
try rebooting your router, then try again
you could also reboot your computer.
replies.body_tagged:
try rebooting your router, then try again
you could also reboot your computer.

replies.body:
I had already compressed the video.
It's ok, .avi is just slow for me, .mp4 to the rescue! :^)
replies.body_tagged:
I had already compressed the video.
It's ok, .avi is just slow for me, .mp4 to the rescue! :^)

replies.body: Yea my internet is pretty bad, but in .mp4 format it only took 15 - 20 minutes to upload a 1 minute video.. rather than 900 minutes/ 15 hours. xd
replies.body_tagged: Yea my internet is pretty bad, but in .mp4 format it only took 15 - 20 minutes to upload a 1 minute video.. rather than 900 minutes/ 15 hours. xd
